title: Edouble
author: Edouble
content: i recently joined this casino but i suddenly noticed that its payout seems to be near 0%is this a loyal place to play or is it a "deposit only" casino?i know they OPERATE WITHOUT A REGULAR LICENCE right?What do you think

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First time coming across or rather, reading about this casino, I will suggest you try and do some research online, find out what other players or user of the casino are saying, if you are ultimately not comfortable with the casino, I will advice you leave and find another more reputable casino to join, there are lots of them, don't be on the river side and suffer from soap entering your eyes, better stay clear and don't deposit any fund into this casino if you are not exactly sure about their reputation, this is to avoid stories that touch the heart.My 2 ¢.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I will advice you to use trustworthy casinos on this forum. Go to gambling board to check. I check Trustpilot review about the casino, it is bad, poorly rated.https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.ltccasino.comDo not even believe the little good reviews you saw, they can be bought.I will advise you to avoid this type of casino. There are good ones on gambling board on this forum.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: To begin with, a few links that may be useful :LTC Casino-official BTT topic LTC CASINO ResolvedTrustPilotI don't know how people come up with such casinos, but to me it doesn't look convincing at all, and even less professional - for those who like challenges in terms of drama around withdrawing funds and the like, it seems like an ideal opportunity

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: The casino has low review ratings and that must be a no go warning for you. Apparently there are 2 threads created about them, one seemed to be a resolved accusation but the other was thought to be a shill account of the casino showing faking wins. Your call.1 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5389546.02 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5377941.0

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5389546.300LTCCasino should be avoided, even the provider slot (Wazdan) register to bitcointalk for the case saying that the site are fraud. First time to see provider are giving some clarification.It's already simple reason you should not play on there.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: Edouble on May 19, 2023, 03:00:34 PMi recently joined this casino but i suddenly noticed that its payout seems to be near 0%is this a loyal place to play or is it a "deposit only" casino?i know they OPERATE WITHOUT A REGULAR LICENCE right?What do you thinkI saw many scam accusations on this website and they even need more than 6 months to get the case resolved. If you search the review on Trustpilot you will see a 2.6 review. so i believe it will be good to just leave the website so you will not get scammed.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I am not sure I have ever visited their site before but with the reviews and comment I have seen and read so far I don't I'd advice anyone to go to that casino.likee even Trustpilot reviews that can be paid for still has so many negative revieews against them, that really says alot abou them.If you haven't being scammed by  this site it's best you avoid them.Even the representative here has an active flag here on bitcointalk, although it seems like the issue has already being resolved according to the reference link but yet it's still a proof of  just how shitty the casino is.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: If the payout is near zero that means the casino does not pay out players winning so it is a real scam just like every other scam casino we have around and you should avoid them, If you have not made a deposit then I will advise you to not to attempt that since you can lose your deposits.You must play only on reputable casinos with a long time history of high player payout, to avoid falling into scams.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Edouble on May 19, 2023, 03:00:34 PMi recently joined this casino but i suddenly noticed that its payout seems to be near 0%is this a loyal place to play or is it a "deposit only" casino?i know they OPERATE WITHOUT A REGULAR LICENCE right?What do you thinkGood thing about ltccasino is that they have an announcement thread in here. Bad thing is that because it has an announcement thread of it everyone can see it's a shady operation. Stick to the ones that don't have negative trust in here and avoid the casinos that don't have an announcement thread in here and you'll be safe.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: So why do people in the first play in such casinos?I will never understand this,we have this very section where all ANN threads of each casino if it is a crypto one is mostly here and from such list anyone can read the ANN threads and make his own conclusions after reading the material.However the ones who have a big ANN thread with lots of pages and that the thread is active daily,full of positive reviews and feedback,ongoing promotions and people only talk good about them,the people who want to join a casino should join one with such standards.It is not a problem of being able to play with LTC or any other crypto as most casinos from these reputable ones accept almost any of the well known cryptos out there.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on May 19, 2023, 06:59:10 PM-snip-It's not everyone's fault to be asked.It's more better to ask, rather than facing some problem in another day. Another things, not everyone is a forum expert they could be just joined to check credibility and cannot find the thread.Not really wrong to be ask.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: If you have doubts then just forget that casino there are too many legitimate casinos out here that can cater your needs and you can trust. Just read some of the threads here in this very section and you'll find them. If you're playing for seek of LTC there are other casinos that accepts it, this casino is likely a scam one.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: If you experience such a thing in a casino, it is possible that their house edge is modified to possible highest configuration.  If that is the case then we should avoid this kind of casino at all cost.  There are lots of reputable provably fair casinos that exist in this forum.  Choosing one of them won't hurt and may avoid us to experience a near 0 reward output.Aside from that, the low rating of the casino simply shows the unsatisfactory experience of its users.  So I think there is no need to think about in avoiding this kind of casino gambling platform.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on May 19, 2023, 06:59:10 PMSo why do people in the first play in such casinos?I will never understand this,we have this very section where all ANN threads of each casino if it is a crypto one is mostly here and from such list anyone can read the ANN threads and make his own conclusions after reading the material.You won't know how people thinks unless it happened. There should be some point where the users find it more like going to play on such casino, maybe bonus, higher odds, etc except the reputation. Besides that, not all people jave an account on this forum to check the casino's reputation here. Well, it's their sole responsibility to have a thorough research, a simple google will shown you a bunch of review results on how casino operates. But if it was neglected, then a bad outcome will probably inevitable.

comments.author: macson
comments.body: Quote from: Edouble on May 19, 2023, 03:00:34 PMsnipWhat do you thinkThe rating for this gambling site is really low, there is no guarantee that you will be safe and calm if you play on this site.  anyway, it's important for you to first check the reputation of a gambling site if you want to play on it and make a deposit, don't be easily tempted by friends' invitations, or the bonuses offered, and stay critical, that's important.  just move to another casino, if you don't want to be cheated, there is no compelling reason for you to continue playing on this site.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I haven't heard the name of this casino for a while since last year when I kept posting it in the thread where they were accusing them of scam, I'll post what I said last year:Quote from: Slow death on August 05, 2022, 08:44:43 AMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 31, 2022, 09:06:11 PMUpdating your quote so the users can recheck the case.Red Flag: LoyceV, Slow death, Pmalek, TwitchySeal, joeperry, WhyFhy, Jawhead999, Mahdirakib, Blossom15, naim027, GamblingBro, shrxktYellow/light orange flag: LoyceV, Slow death, TwitchySeal, khaled0111, shasan, WhyFhy, Jawhead999, acroman08, Mahdirakib, naim027, PaperWallet, lule29, shrxkt, giornogiovanaI removed the negative feedback and removed my support for the flag. Op is already receiving his money so the case is resolved, there is no need to change it to neutralsource: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5389546.msg60692556#msg60692556I'm posting this here so that in case you go to this thread and see that the case has been resolved, don't go thinking that the casino is 100% reliable, the time this happened to today has been many months and obviously they may have behavior changed or maybe it got worse, they have withdrawal limits and also from what I could conclude they don't like it when a player wins a lot of money in the casino, especially if that player makes small deposits in their casino. So they start to invent a lot of things for the customer. Don't withdraw a lot of money from their casino.do you prefer to use a reliable casino and that you won't have headaches? i suggest you forget about this casino and instead of looking for these scam casinos, you should use reliable casinos like stake.com which is an old casino and has good bonuses and good service, I just use stake.com and I'm not just saying this because I'm in their campaign, I'm saying this because I use stake.com to place my sports bets, stop looking for these new and scam casinos, use reliable casinos like stake.com, I'm constantly asking myself why people are running after these scam casinos

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Edouble on May 19, 2023, 03:00:34 PMi recently joined this casino but i suddenly noticed that its payout seems to be near 0%is this a loyal place to play or is it a "deposit only" casino?i know they OPERATE WITHOUT A REGULAR LICENCE right?What do you thinkNext time when bring issue like this, drop the website link so that people can just click on it and navigate to the casino website. Now we have to retype the domain name in the browser before getting to the site. You would have provided some the evidence of the deposit and the payout box to us so things would be easy to believe. The casino itself is a new casino to me. No casino is meant only for deposit they must be a payout. It's like you have not follow the instructions to do everything alright.

By next time, do first research before making such a deposit because it you are seems like wasting your money if the casino is unlikely to let your money withdraw from their wallet. There are too many reputable and popular gambling casinos here to choose and I think that is not hard to find one.

Op is already receiving his money so the case is resolved, there is no need to change it to neutralsource: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5389546.msg60692556#msg60692556I'm posting this here so that in case you go to this thread and see that the case has been resolved, don't go thinking that the casino is 100% reliable, the time this happened to today has been many months and obviously they may have behavior changed or maybe it got worse, they have withdrawal limits and also from what I could conclude they don't like it when a player wins a lot of money in the casino, especially if that player makes small deposits in their casino. So they start to invent a lot of things for the customer. Don't withdraw a lot of money from their casino.do you prefer to use a reliable casino and that you won't have headaches? i suggest you forget about this casino and instead of looking for these scam casinos, you should use reliable casinos like stake.com which is an old casino and has good bonuses and good service, I just use stake.com and I'm not just saying this because I'm in their campaign, I'm saying this because I use stake.com to place my sports bets, stop looking for these new and scam casinos, use reliable casinos like stake.com, I'm constantly asking myself why people are running after these scam casinoswhat i can deduce from here is that when you start winning be cautious because you may not even see your funds. that clearly means, they can't be trusted at all. the case may have been resolved because it was published here and they don't want to ruin their reputation. but how many other similar cases which have not been brought up tot the eyes of the public? bottomline, better look for other reputable casinos found in the forum rather than risk to a small casino who has problems disbursing your winnings.
